verses.text: Make a joyful noise unto God, all ye lands:
Sing forth the honour of his name: Make his praise glorious.
Say unto God, How terrible art thou in thy works!
All the earth shall worship thee,
Come and see the works of God:
He turned the sea into dry land:
He ruleth by his power for ever; His eyes behold the nations:
O bless our God, ye people,
Which holdeth our soul in life,
For thou, O God, hast proved us:
Thou broughtest us into the net;
Thou hast caused men to ride over our heads;
I will go into thy house with burnt offerings:
which my lips have uttered, and my mouth hath spoken, when I was in trouble.
I will offer unto thee burnt sacrifices of fatlings, with the incense of rams;
Come and hear, all ye that fear God,
I cried unto him with my mouth,
If I regard iniquity in my heart,
But verily God hath heard me ;
Blessed be God, which hath not turned away my prayer,
